a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Excess mortality: Deaths from all causes compared to average over
The percentage difference between the reported number of weekly or monthly deaths in 2020–2024 and the average number
of deaths in the same period over the years 2015–2019.
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2024); World Mortality Dataset (2024)
Note: The reported number of deaths might not count all deaths that occurred due to incomplete coverage and delays in reporting.
